title: New Champ: Zoe, the Aspect of Twilight preview

embed.description: Check out an early, in-game look at League's newest mischief-maker Zoe: The Aspect of Twilight. Releasing in patch 7.23!

body: When Riot is more Disney than Disney themselves.

replies.body: Her visuals don't fit League. She looks like a character from a Disney Pixar movie.
Maybe her model, but her abilities don't look out of place at all.
Also her looking like a character from a Disney movie was exactly Riot's intent lol
Maybe I should have used the term "art style" to be more precise.
We have a fucking armordillo, space dragon, fuzzy satan, killer clowns, half bird people, and literal edgelords; but a normal human is crossing the line?
Look at every other human in League: not a single one of them shares the same art style as the new champion. She looks completely out of place.
Jinx looks weird as fuck, Sivir looks weird, Sona looks weird, the only difference here, is this chanp has a round face not angular.

This seems like both the most fun and annoying champion at the same time.
Also, I hope that's not her classic skin, cause that doesn't look like League at all

Well, she does seem to wear Targonian accessories (gems and necklaces).

I'm not sure if her clothes are actually Targonian though- Although, we don't know what every-day/kids clothing looks like there really.
They could easily be something from another region, because remember that Aspects can posses anyone who reaches the top.

If Zoe is full Targon, then her aesthetics are very interesting.
I'd tag **Mr. Sunny Koda (Kindlejack)**, her concept artist for a more definite answer, but I feel like his response would be telling me to wait for the full story. :P

But I guess that'd be fair.
Stories are cool. :>

The full story will be coming yes indeed, but you raise some interesting points about how kids dress in Runeterra and what region/s Zoe's clothes are from. I can at least confirm that Zoe dresses herself, so as you can imagine her style is far from typical.

I think during development I repeatedly said to people 'You're American but you don't walk around wearing a stars-and-stripes baseball cap' just as I shy away from the wife beater, stubbies and thongs that are the uniform of [my people](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5f/f0/bf/5ff0bf2597cc322ea6388b1643aea065.jpg). You'll have characters like Garen that wear their faction's colours proudly, and others like Lucian who prefer their own style.
What's your people?
Aussies.

So... she knows she lives on a frozen mountain, right?

Or is she a non-Targonian Aspect?
She originates from Targon but like Taric she doesn't reside there. She goes where she pleases.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Eh9AnE6L,comment-id=000000010000000b0000,timestamp=2017-11-03T20:22:45.648+0000)
>
> She originates from Targon but like Taric she doesn't reside there. She goes where she pleases.

Zoe confirmed for Mundo's sister?

Can I slip in a quick question? Im trying to figure out how she works exactely :D
at ~0:39 Zoe flashed, and shortly after that flashed again, but she didnt collect the flash bubble (she collected the {{item:3152}} bubble)
a) it was a visual bug
b) ups, we missed something there
c) everything is correct as seen!

EDIT:) btw. the kick of the sleep bubble looks pretty nice thematically speaking, GG to whoever did that, or as we say in German "GeeGEE!" ;P
This was an actual play in-game so it's all above board. You'll be able to figure it out when you see her kit.
Her release skin was teased towards the end and I think it's Academy.
It's probably Arcade.

{{champion:98}} Aspect of Twilight...?
{{champion:238}} Bruh you got cucked
{{champion:98}} Shut up, Zed.
{{champion:141}} HOW DARE YOU INSULT THE MASTER GAAAH
{{champion:98}} Oh, dear. She... flashed 3 times...
{{champion:238}} Damn. We've all been cucked.
{{champion:98}} Please stop using that word.
{{champion:238}} DANG. We've all been cucked. Happy now?
{{champion:98}} ...do you hear that?
######{{champion:202}} SHE ONLY FLASHED 3 TIMES... 3... IMPERFECTION... IMPERFECTION... I CAN'T FOURGET THIS... WHY DIDN'T SHE DO IT FOUR TIMES WHY MUST THEY ALWAYS HAVE 3 AND NEVER REACH PERFECTION... DAMN YOU CERTAINLYTHREE...
Let's be honest, if Ahri flashed that much she would bring up the game's rating to M real quick.

Do we really want a game where every character is just a different version of garen? I like my games to have lulus, heimers, nunus, annies, and amumus. Heck even jinx and soraka seem to be in this vein of fun loving or cute characters. Im sure the next 5 champs will go straight back to being burly and sexy don't worry. 

Also, yordles in general dont fit in with the human characters. Its not game breaking to have a weird new character.

she never was alone.....


{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
she flashed 3 times??? WHO APPROVED THIS

it looked like she stole flashes from the other champs look at the video a flash  dropped from Viktor , maybe in the original text post that's why they said hold onto you summoner spells cuz she can use them if you do
CertainlyT did.

Remember how {{champion:89}}  in the old lore was a paragon of virtue and tolerance in a society of religious zealots? Remember how in the new lore she just became the leader of said zealots?
Could you explain to me why you made Runeterra so grim and dark, only to bring us this? And I don't say that I don't like Zoe. I find her new and different for what you have been making in character personalities and models. I say that now that Zoe is a thing, you could make us the favor of making {{champion:89}} how she was before.ï»¿

To criticize something, I say there is something weird with her facial animations. She feels too cartoony for a wolrd where other humans have measures so proportioned. Is she a more human looking yordle than usual? Because is the only thing that explains why she looks so cartoony in a world like this.

Boards:  We hate yasuo
CerainlyT: Hold my beer

On a side note this champ looks absolutely hilarious.

I can't say much from just the teaser, but her model doesn't seem to fit in with the aesthetic of game at all and I don't like her so far... I'll try not to say too much more until I know more about her I guess.
Oh god... SOMEONE KILL IT WITH FIRE!
She used flash twice in 5 seconds. Yep Certainly T made this champion

I've lost any hope with new champions appealing to me.

VGU's just seem to be so much more mature and actually feel like solid designs.

Credit due where it's due though, the actual gameplay does look interesting.
You didn't like Kayn? I mean come on his designer cited him as the most metal champ he's done.
And Babymetal is the most metal thing Japan has created.
This is why {{champion:432}} & {{champion:103}} can't be "just friends".
I'm not sure why so many complaints. I personally am really excited to ban this champion every game!
"Aspect of Twilight"? So she's an actual Targonian Aspect, not just inhabited by one?
I mean she looks like a fkin anime character hardly looks human
She ... really doesn't look anime at all. Are all the people who are saying this the niche that has both never seen anime and never seen a Disney movie, ever?
No im not a weeb sorry
Ah, so you're one of those people who talk about things they don't know.

> [{quoted}](name=XIII Vanitas,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Eh9AnE6L,comment-id=00010000000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-03T12:53:59.229+0000)
>
> Ah, so you're one of those people who talk about things that they don't know.

Yes, i like to stay away from things like this. Im not sure how long im guna perma ban this chick, probably until yasuo steps out of line again
I wish to be blissfully ignorant about this stuff
I can voice my opinions all i want
And we can tell you not to all we want. That's not really an argument.
To be honest, her art style makes her look like she's from Mobile Legends...
